name: Hier kommt Alex
wikiSummary: "Hier kommt Alex" (Here comes Alex) is a song by Die Toten Hosen. It's the first single and the first track from the album Ein kleines bisschen Horrorschau. The song in concept introduces Alex, who is the central character on the concept album and who is based on the main character of Stanley Kubrick's 1971 movie "A Clockwork Orange".  "Hier kommt Alex" is structurally and musically similar to the last track from the album, "Bye, Bye Alex".
wikiText:
"Hier kommt Alex" (Here comes Alex) is a song by Die Toten Hosen. It's the first single and the first track from the album Ein kleines bisschen Horrorschau. The song in concept introduces Alex, who is the central character on the concept album and who is based on the main character of Stanley Kubrick's 1971 movie "A Clockwork Orange".
 
 "Hier kommt Alex" is structurally and musically similar to the last track from the album, "Bye, Bye Alex".
